machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
M104 S{material_standby_temperature}
G91
G0 Z0.4 F600
G90
G0 X{prime_tower_position_x - prime_tower_size/2} Y{prime_tower_position_y + prime_tower_size/2} F6000

machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
G0 X{prime_tower_position_x - prime_tower_size/2} Y{prime_tower_position_y + prime_tower_size/2} F6000
G91
G0 Z-0.4 F600
G90
